message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I'm willing to pay $95 for it.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. I can sell it to you for $105.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to keep the negotiations going. How about if we aim for $100?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a good price for the product. I can sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I believe we're getting closer. I am willing to pay $105 for the product.
I'm glad we're still in negotiations, Bob! I think we can meet in the middle again. I can sell it to you for $112.50.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am willing to pay $110 for the product.

I appreciate your continued interest, Bob! I'm willing to make one last concession. I can sell it to you for $112.50, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate your offers, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I am willing to pay $110 for the product.
